explanations.machine learning: The paper explicitly mentions the use of machine learning algorithms for predicting successful aging.
explanations.supervised learning: The study uses supervised learning techniques as it involves training models on labeled data to predict successful aging.
explanations.classification: The research focuses on classifying individuals into successful aging (SA) and non-SA classes using machine learning models.
explanations.support vector machine: The paper lists support vector machine as one of the machine learning techniques used in the study.
explanations.SVM: SVM is an abbreviation for support vector machine, which is mentioned as one of the techniques employed.
explanations.decision tree: The study includes decision tree as one of the basic machine learning techniques used for prediction.
explanations.neural network: The paper mentions the use of artificial neural networks as part of the machine learning techniques applied in the research.
